page.title: 06INDUSTRY ON E. BANK OF TAFF
page.content:
List of industries (contd)
Off Collingdon Road {j) Beal and Sons}- produce anchor chains and export them world wide. {k) Whyndam Engineering}- repairs to engines and steelworks. {l) Cardiff East Moors}is the site of British Steel although many of the foundaries have now closed. Bute East Dock is no longer in use and the sitebis overgrown. {m) Cardiff Steel Fabrications}- sell industrial doors and export as far as the Middle East. {n) Cardiff Roofing Centre}- sell concrete roof tiles. {o) Reperhurst Plastic Fabrications}- sell to shipping and steelworks. {p) Swirco Newton (merchants)}- sell hoses, polythene valves, tubes, etc. {q) Mysons Ltd.,}- sell radiators.
